UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile and account information in the E&F WorkBee application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user, matching their Firebase Auth UID.

name.description: The full name of the user.

accountType.description: The type of user account: 'Worker' or 'Customer'.

photoUrl.description: URL to the user's profile photo.

skills.description: List of skills or service categories the user provides.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the profile was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile and account information. Each document is indexed by the user's Auth UID to ensure simple, direct linkage between authentication and data.
